channel.title: +1 Forward - Firebrands Series - Mobile Frame 0: Firebrands
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/summer-series-firebrands-mobile-frame-zero-firebrands
Rach and Rich kick off their third Summer Series. This series will cover games in the Firebrands style of PbtA games. This first episode features Meguey and Vincent Baker, creators of *​Mobile Frame Zero: Firebrands* , the first Firebrands game.
*(we even renamed the segments!)*
Timecodes: 00:02:03 - Setting Up 00:13:14 - The Challenge 00:31:06 - Playing the Games
You can find their games here: https://lumpley.games/
Meguey's "talking to people" writing was found here: https://twitter.com/NightSkyGames/status/1425890164975575047
